ai-tha-ap557:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap557:1.4_0: I went out of my resort,
ai-tha-ap557:2.1_0: I’ve seen fruits in the fruit,
ai-tha-ap557:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap557:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap557:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap557:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vajjis.
ai-tha-ap557:8.1_0: The fifth Elder elder Vajjiputtaka for the sake of the Vajjiputtaka
